Title: I'm Still Here
Director: Walter Banasiak, Daniel Grenchik, Harry Locke IV
Writer: Walter Banasiak, David Grenchik, Harry Locke IV
Actors: Walter Banasiak, Harry Locke IV, Daniel Grenchik, Mark Svalina
Plot: A loner with a death wish (Walter Banasiak)seeks vengeance against the gang lord (Harry Locke IV) responsible for the murder of his mother and best friend.
